about_the_game:
Get ready to hit the skyways at breakneck speeds in this new Race Mode DLC for MiLE HiGH TAXi.

The expansion introduces a whole new dimension to the game, transforming the bustling, futuristic city into your personal racetrack. Compete against the other NPC taxi drivers in races that will test your skills and reflexes to the limit. While mastering Single Race Mode and Circuit Mode you'll have plenty of opportunities to prove your mettle and claim the title of the fastest taxi in Mile High City.



Race Mode DLC introduces the game-changing InstaBoost, capable of blasting you to a mind-blowing 400k/h. Feel the rush of wind in a heart-stopping race against time. This mode is all about speed and precision - there are no passengers pickups, no deliveries to make, just pure, unadulterated racing.

And the best part? THIS EXHILARATING DLC IS ABSOLUTELY FREE!

So strap in, hold tight, and prepare for the ride of your life with the "Race Mode" DLC for MiLE HiGH TAXi.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux
  • Processor: Core i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 680 (30fps+) Will run as low as Intel UHD-630
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: I've gotten the game to run on hardware as low as Intel UHD 640 at 30fps. Mileage may vary
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 (60fps+)
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
